item.title: Gatecoin CEO Reveals $2 Million Loss in Hacking Incident
item.description:
Gatecoin CEO Reveals $2 Million Loss in Hacking Incident

On Saturday, Gatecoin CEO Aur√©lien Menant, released a statement that details the nature of the hack and how the exchange managed to lose 15% of client's digital currency deposits. Gatecoin has always kept 95% of all customer funds in multi-signature cold wallets, however, the hacker managed to alter Gatecoin systems in such a way as to divert ETH deposits away from these secure cold wallets.

item.title: What are the missing consumer services for bitcoin?
item.description:
What are the missing consumer services for bitcoin?

Just found it today, Google earth isn't available in India but still shows Taj mahal in the app description pics. I am great fan of Google maps and find it always helpful in finding the right route to my frequent travel destinations.

item.title: Russia's Largest Bank Adopts Blockchain, Develops App for Conversational Commerce
item.description:
Russia's Largest Bank Adopts Blockchain, Develops App for Conversational Commerce

In the heart of Silicon Valley which booms with innovation, Russia's largest bank, Sberbank has announced the developing and testing of a new mobile application for conversational commerce - Sberbank Messenger. Sberbank has developed Sberbank Messenger which represents a multifunctional platform for communications and financial transactions.

item.title: How are some people always ahead of the majority(bitcoin for example)?
item.description:
How are some people always ahead of the majority(bitcoin for example)?

Answer (1 of 3): I've already said this in another answer: getting information is easy, getting understanding is not. I knew about Bitcoin as soon as it was announced on Slashdot - this was the second wave, the first wave being people that hung out on cryptography mailing lists.

item.title: The DAO Raises More Than $117 Million in World's Largest Crowdfunding to Date
item.description:
The DAO Raises More Than $117 Million in World's Largest Crowdfunding to Date

A new entity called The DAO, based on Ethereum, has raised more than $100 million since late April and will use the funds to support projects in the sharing economy. The DAO wants to be a model for a new kind of organization, created and run using blockchain software rather than conventional corporate structures.

item.title: Bloq's Paul Sztorc on the 4 Main Benefits of Sidechains
item.description:
Bloq's Paul Sztorc on the 4 Main Benefits of Sidechains

Most people in the Bitcoin community know Paul Sztorc for his work on the Truthcoin concept (now backed by Roger Ver and currently in development as Bitcoin Hivemind), but the former Yale statistician also recently joined blockchain startup Bloq (of which Bitcoin Core contributor Jeff Garzik is a co-founder) under the role of economist.

item.description: @twiteis Bitcoin support is on the road map -- so please stay tuned! Thanks for using LastPass!

item.title: American consumers increasingly using mobile wallets, P2P payments, survey finds
item.description:
American consumers increasingly using mobile wallets, P2P payments, survey finds

The survey observes that, not surprisingly, Millennials use new payment options, such as mobile wallets and P2P payments, at a higher rate than does the general population, and use cash slightly less.
